typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ITEMCODE as string,
		BARCODE as string,
		PRODUCTNAMEARABIC as string,
		DESCRIPTIONARABIC as string,
		PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH as string,
		DESCRIPTIONENGLISH as string,
		UNITITEMBARCODE as string,
		NOOFUNITITEMS as string,
		UNITWEIGHTSIZE as string,
		UNITUOM as string,
		PACKAGEUOM as string,
		COSTPRICE as string,
		SELLINGPRICE as string,
		BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH as string,
		BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC as string,
		MOCIPRODUCTGROUP as string,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME as string,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENISO as string,
		HSCODE as string,
		SUPPLIERCR as string,
		SUPPLIERNAME as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL11 as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL12 as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL13 as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL14 as string,
		WIDTH as string,
		HEIGHT as string,
		DEPTH as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgproductserrlog
stgproductserrlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace(DS_FILENAME,'.','_err.')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ITEMCODE,
		BARCODE,
		PRODUCTNAMEARABIC,
		DESCRIPTIONARABIC,
		PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH,
		DESCRIPTIONENGLISH,
		UNITITEMBARCODE,
		NOOFUNITITEMS,
		UNITWEIGHTSIZE,
		UNITUOM,
		PACKAGEUOM,
		COSTPRICE,
		SELLINGPRICE,
		BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH,
		BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC,
		MOCIPRODUCTGROUP,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENISO,
		HSCODE,
		SUPPLIERCR,
		SUPPLIERNAME,
		CATEGORYLEVEL11,
		CATEGORYLEVEL12,
		CATEGORYLEVEL13,
		CATEGORYLEVEL14,
		WIDTH,
		HEIGHT,
		DEPTH,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME,
		ID_ERROR_CODE,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		COMPANYCR as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE as string,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgtransationtypeerrlog
stgtransationtypeerrlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace(DS_FILENAME,'.','_err.')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		COMPANYCR as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE as string,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES as string,
		ERRORCODE as string
	),
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		COMPANYCR,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES,
		ERRORCODE = DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogcsv

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Main or Branch-  } as string,
		{Company Name Arabic-  } as string,
		{Company Name English-  } as string,
		{Commercial Registration No-  } as string,
		{Commercial License number-  } as string,
		{Area- } as string,
		{Street Name- } as string,
		{Area Number- } as string,
		{Street Number2- } as string,
		{Building Number- } as string,
		{ Phone Number-  } as string,
		{Fax-} as string,
		{P.O. Box- } as string,
		{Email- } as string,
		{Website- } as string,
		{Map Location Url-   } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(MainorBranch,CompanyNameArabic,CompanyNameEnglish),iifNull(CommercialRegistrationNo,CommercialLicensenumber,Area),iifNull(iifNull(StreetName,AreaNumber,StreetNumber2),
iifNull(BuildingNumber,PhoneNumber,Fax),iifNull(POBox,Email,Website))))!= true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MainorBranch as string,
		CompanyNameArabic as string,
		CompanyNameEnglish as string,
		CommercialRegistrationNo as string,
		CommercialLicensenumber as string,
		Area as string,
		StreetName as string,
		AreaNumber as string,
		StreetNumber2 as string,
		BuildingNumber as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Fax as string,
		{P.O.Box} as string,
		Email as string,
		Website as string,
		MapLocationUrl as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MainorBranch,
		CompanyNameArabic,
		CompanyNameEnglish,
		CommercialRegistrationNo,
		CommercialLicensenumber,
		Area,
		StreetName,
		AreaNumber,
		StreetNumber2,
		BuildingNumber,
		PhoneNumber,
		Fax,
		{P.O.Box} = POBox,
		Email,
		Website,
		MapLocationUrl,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgCompany
